avast.name: Avast Ye!
avast.description: A hailing phrase to indicate that the hailed must stop and give attention.

bilge.name: Bilge
bilge.description: The lowest part inside the ship, within the hull itself. If any place on the ship was going to be dank and musty, the bilge was such a place. It was the first place to show signs of leakage and was often considered the most filthy, dead space of a ship. Hence, a "bilge rat" is a creature considered most lowly by a pirate. Though, many a pirate found himself eating those same rats to survive!
